column4: anyone heard about any  problems with sound recording in 6.10 being very low , as in mic gain is too low?
there are known issues depending on which codec you use.
ive installed w32codecs, and the gain is all the way up
no, not a software codec, a -hardware- codec. I gave you command, the output from which you need to tell me.
ok, from the output of ``amixer'', do you see a Mic Boost?
try increasing your VIA DXS elements.
amixer set 'VIA DXS',0 90% && amixer set 'VIA DXS',1 90% && amixer set 'VIA DXS',2 90% && amixer set 'VIA DXS',3 90%
ok let me start up sound recorder again
yes that seems to have improved it, thank you
thanks for your help once again, im out
